headline.main: Female Grevy's Zebra Born at Brookfield Zoo Outside Chicago
headline.print_headline: Female Grevy's Zebra Born at Brookfield Zoo Outside Chicago

docs.snippet: A newborn female Grevy's zebra is now on display with its mother at Brookfield Zoo outside Chicago....
docs.lead_paragraph: A newborn female Grevy's zebra is now on display with its mother at Brookfield Zoo outside Chicago.

headline.main: Cameroon Repulses Boko Haram Attack, Kills Three Militants
headline.print_headline: Cameroon Repulses Boko Haram Attack, Kills Three Militants

docs.snippet: Cameroon's army has repulsed an attack by Boko Haram and killed three of the Nigerian Islamist militants in heavy fighting in the Far North region of the country, a Cameroon government spokesman said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cameroon's army has repulsed an attack by Boko Haram and killed three of the Nigerian Islamist militants in heavy fighting in the Far North region of the country, a Cameroon government spokesman said on Thursday.

headline.main: Top Adviser to Iran's Khamenei Says 'Redlines' Should Be Respected in Nuclear Talks: Tasnim
headline.print_headline: Top Adviser to Iran's Khamenei Says 'Redlines' Should Be Respected in Nuclear Talks: Tasnim

docs.snippet: The top adviser to Iran's supreme leader said on Friday that Tehran's "redlines" should be respected in nuclear talks with major powers aimed at curbing the country's nuclear program, the semi-official Iranian news agency Tasnim reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: The top adviser to Iran's supreme leader said on Friday that Tehran's "redlines" should be respected in nuclear talks with major powers aimed at curbing the country's nuclear program, the semi-official Iranian news agency Tasnim reported.

headline.main: Montana Tribe Breaks Off Talks Over Drilling on Sacred Land
headline.print_headline: Montana Tribe Breaks Off Talks Over Drilling on Sacred Land

docs.snippet: An American Indian tribe in Montana has taken the rare step of breaking off formal talks with the U.S. government and a Louisiana company that has been seeking for decades to drill for natural gas on land considered sacred by the Blackfeet people....
docs.lead_paragraph: An American Indian tribe in Montana has taken the rare step of breaking off formal talks with the U.S. government and a Louisiana company that has been seeking for decades to drill for natural gas on land considered sacred by the Blackfeet people.

headline.main: Greece Offers New Tax Hikes in Latest Bailout Proposal
headline.print_headline: Greece Offers New Tax Hikes in Latest Bailout Proposal

docs.snippet: Greece offered new measures including a tax hike on shipping companies and scrapping tax breaks for its islands in the latest proposal sent to creditors on Thursday for a cash-for-reforms deal, as Athens races to win new funds to avert bankruptcy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece offered new measures including a tax hike on shipping companies and scrapping tax breaks for its islands in the latest proposal sent to creditors on Thursday for a cash-for-reforms deal, as Athens races to win new funds to avert bankruptcy.

headline.main: Legislator During Debate Over Rebel Flag

docs.snippet: State Representative Michael A. Pitts spoke this week during a debate at the South Carolina House....
docs.lead_paragraph: State Representative Michael A. Pitts spoke this week during a debate at the South Carolina House.

headline.main: British Man Denies Being Disorderly, Hitting Woman on Plane
headline.print_headline: British Man Denies Being Disorderly, Hitting Woman on Plane

docs.snippet: A British man accused of becoming belligerent on an international flight, hitting a woman traveling with him and urinating on the plane's seats and floor pleaded not guilty on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British man accused of becoming belligerent on an international flight, hitting a woman traveling with him and urinating on the plane's seats and floor pleaded not guilty on Thursday.

headline.main: United Airlines Expects Profit Margin in Lower Range of Outlook
headline.print_headline: United Airlines Expects Profit Margin in Lower Range of Outlook

docs.snippet: United Continental Holdings Inc said on Thursday its pretax profit margin for the second quarter will be in the lower range of its earlier outlook and said the strong U.S. dollar has hurt demand from travelers abroad....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Continental Holdings Inc said on Thursday its pretax profit margin for the second quarter will be in the lower range of its earlier outlook and said the strong U.S. dollar has hurt demand from travelers abroad.
